pages.accommodations: White Wind - Accommodations Accommodations at White Wind Beach Resort Your Home Away From Home At White Wind Beach Resort, we believe that comfort and luxury go hand in hand. Our accommodations are designed to provide a serene retreat, allowing you to unwind and rejuvenate while enjoying breathtaking views of the Arabian Sea. Each room and suite is thoughtfully appointed with modern amenities and elegant decor, ensuring a memorable stay. Room Types Ocean View Rooms Overview: Experience the beauty of the coastline from your private balcony in our Ocean View Rooms. These spacious accommodations are perfect for couples or solo travelers seeking a peaceful escape. King-sized bed or twin beds En-suite bathroom with modern fixtures Air conditioning and ceiling fan Flat-screen TV and complimentary Wi-Fi Minibar and coffee/tea making facilities Deluxe Suites Overview: Ideal for families or those desiring extra space, our Deluxe Suites offer a separate living area and luxurious furnishings. Enjoy the comfort of home with the added benefit of resort amenities. Spacious living area with comfortable seating Private bedroom with king-sized bed Large bathroom with a soaking tub and separate shower Balcony with stunning ocean views Enhanced amenities including a refrigerator and microwave Beachfront Villas Overview: Indulge in the ultimate luxury with our exclusive Beachfront Villas. These stunning accommodations provide direct access to the beach and are designed for those who seek privacy and elegance. Private terrace with sun loungers and outdoor dining area Private pool and outdoor shower Fully equipped kitchen for self-catering Personalized concierge service for tailored experiences Luxurious bathroom with premium toiletries and a soaking tub Amenities & Services At White Wind Beach Resort, we prioritize your comfort and convenience. Our accommodations include a range of amenities to enhance your stay: Daily Housekeeping: Ensuring your space is always clean and welcoming. 24-Hour Room Service: Enjoy delicious meals and snacks in the comfort of your room. Explore our accommodations and choose the perfect room or suite for your stay at White Wind Beach Resort. Special Offers Check our website for seasonal promotions and packages that make your stay even more enjoyable. Whether it’s a romantic escape, a family vacation, or a solo retreat, we have the perfect offer for you. We look forward to welcoming you to White Wind Beach Resort, where every moment is designed for relaxation and enjoyment. Book your stay today and create unforgettable memories by the sea!
pages.dining: White Wind - Dining Dining at White Wind Beach Resort Culinary Delights by the Sea At White Wind Beach Resort, dining is not just a meal; it's an experience. Our on-site restaurant offers a diverse selection of culinary delights that celebrate the rich flavors of Tamil Nadu and beyond. Whether you’re looking for a casual bite or a fine dining experience, we have something to satisfy every palate. Our Restaurant Ocean Breeze Restaurant Overview: With stunning views of the Arabian Sea, Ocean Breeze Restaurant provides the perfect backdrop for your dining experience. Enjoy the gentle sea breeze as you indulge in exquisite dishes prepared by our talented chefs. Ambiance: The restaurant features both indoor and outdoor seating, allowing you to choose between a cozy, air-conditioned environment or a romantic dinner under the stars. Menu Highlights Local Cuisine Savor the authentic tastes of Tamil Nadu with our selection of traditional dishes made from locally sourced ingredients. Highlights include: Seafood Curry: Freshly caught fish simmered in a rich coconut curry, served with steamed rice. Dosa & Idli Platter: A delightful assortment of crispy dosas and fluffy idlis, accompanied by tangy chutneys and sambar. International Flavors For those craving global cuisine, our menu also features a variety of international dishes: Grilled Mediterranean Chicken: Marinated chicken served with a side of roasted vegetables and garlic mashed potatoes. Pasta Primavera: A colorful medley of seasonal vegetables tossed in a light garlic and olive oil sauce. Desserts & Beverages Mango Mousse: A light and airy mousse made with fresh mangoes, perfect for a tropical finish. Chocolate Lava Cake: A rich chocolate cake with a molten center, served warm with vanilla ice cream. Special Events & Private Dining Looking to celebrate a special occasion? Our team can assist you in planning private dining experiences, whether it’s a romantic dinner for two or a festive gathering with friends and family. Dining Hours Breakfast: 7:00 AM - 10:00 AM Lunch: 12:00 PM - 3:00 PM Dinner: 6:30 PM - 10:00 PM Bar Hours: 12:00 PM - 11:00 PM Reservations To ensure a seamless dining experience, we recommend making a reservation, especially during peak season. Contact our front desk or book your table online. We invite you to join us at Ocean Breeze Restaurant, where every meal is a celebration of flavor, culture, and the beauty of coastal living. We look forward to serving you!
